channel.title: Comments on: Memories of Gloria Crouse

item.title: By: tighr10
item.dc:creator: tighr10
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/hooking-matters/memories-of-gloria-crouse/#comment-555">Bea Merriman</a>.
I don't believe it has been reissued on DVD, conversion would be the best to preserve the information. She was a pioneer in our craft/art.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Bea Merriman.

I don’t believe it has been reissued on DVD, conversion would be the best to preserve the information. She was a pioneer in our craft/art.

item.title: By: Bea Merriman
item.dc:creator: Bea Merriman
item.description: I loved her VHS called Hooking Rugs. Have been trying to find it on a DVD. Any ideas? She was so talented and the enjoyment she got out of doing her work always showed. She is missed.
item.content:encoded: I loved her VHS called Hooking Rugs. Have been trying to find it on a DVD. Any ideas? She was so talented and the enjoyment she got out of doing her work always showed. She is missed.
